channel.title: FreeBSD on Welcome to My Site!
channel.description: Recent content in FreeBSD on Welcome to My Site!

item.title: FreeBSD UNIX for Linux sysadmins
item.description: If you’ve ever installed and explored another Linux distro (what Linux sysadmin hasn’t?!?), then exploring FreeBSD is going be somewhat similar with a few key differences. While there is no graphical installation, the installation process is straightforward and similar to installing a server-based Linux distro. Just make sure you choose the local_unbound package when prompted if you want to cache DNS lookups locally, as FreeBSD doesn’t have a built-in local DNS resolver that does this.
